snippet.title: 15 Minutes of Eternal Edge Single Player Gameplay
snippet.description:
Here's 15 minutes of (beta) Eternal Edge gameplay, a game created by Righteous Weasel Games and coming soon to Xbox One!

Our Hero explores "the Expanse," the base-level zone for anyone who is new to the journey. We find some hidden loot, seize some bad guy forts, and beat up some massive nasty machines!

The equipment level up system is also showcased, which is still seeing some edits during beta testing (such as changes to the long "combine" process!)

This video shows the Single Player mode of Eternal Edge, but up to 4 players can play together to explore Eternia and foil Ramden's evil plot!

Twitter:
